trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that derives from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> and provides support for the updated versions of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow"></xref> binding elements.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class adds a system-provided binding similar to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> but uses the Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards (OASIS) standard versions of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A> protocols.
No changes to the object model or default settings are required when using this binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class.

This constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref>.
The binding element with the name configName was not found.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.

This constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.
The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
`true` if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the security binding element from the current binding.
